title: Three men and a baby (Captioned)
creator_credit: Leonard Nimoy, Robert W. Cort, Ted Field and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: The lives of three confirmed Manhattan bachelors are thrown into confusion when a baby girl is left at their front door. A lively remake of the 1985 French comedy “Three men and a cradle”. Starring Ted Danson, Tom Selleck and Steve Guttenberg.
creator_credit_for_label: Leonard Nimoy, Robert W. Cort, Ted Field and Touchstone Pictures
